class.name: KerberosString
class.javadoc:
Implements the ASN.1 KerberosString type. 
                  KerberosString  ::= GeneralString (IA5String)
This definition reflects the Network Working Group RFC 4120 specification available at http://www.ietf.org/rfc/rfc4120.txt.

RFC 4120 defines KerberosString as GeneralString (IA5String), which only includes ASCII characters. However, other implementations have been known to use GeneralString to contain UTF-8 encoding. To interop with these implementations, the following system property is defined. When set as true, KerberosString is encoded as UTF-8. Note that this only affects the byte encoding, the tag of the ASN.1 type is still GeneralString.
